items.content_html: _SimpleDB_ is a TypeScript based library that provides a lightweight and simple asynchronous, JSON file-based storage system. Perfect for smaller applications where you need to perform basic Create, Read, Update, Delete (CRUD) operations, but a full-scale database would be an overkill.
items.title: Bonny-kato/simple-db: _SimpleDB_ is a TypeScript based library that provides a lightweight and simple asynchronous, JSON file-based storage system. Perfect for smaller applications where you need to perform basic Create, Read, Update, Delete (CRUD) operations, but a full-scale database would be an overkill.
